attributes.title: Don’t download ✨🟠
attributes.review: This app took forever to download it took over 3 hours and I have food WiFi and when I went on the app the only thing that should up was a orange screen and I hate the color orange also the app doesn’t let you do anything it’s so boring don’t download ✨🟠 I hate this app and I want it off the App Store 🙄😡

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: I just tried to download this app because you know, tRuMp 2o2O, and it didn’t work! It played so many ads that reminded me of when I was stuck in my closet for 78 hours in a row. Then a picture of Donald trumpy came up and scared me so bad that I haven’t been able to sleep at night 😭 Please remove this app from the apple store! An abomination!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app is one of the worse made apps ever. As soon as I opened my phone, it was as if my phone exploded and got put back together by a toddler. I couldn't even use it for at least 2 hours after opening this app because it glitched my phone so bad. I will NEVER be getting this application again...

attributes.title: Concerned
attributes.review: Concerned about the 17+ rating. Why not 18 when last how old you should be before getting political.  As it most definitely clear, children are too young and dumb to understand anything in the world. Just like the women of the 1900s. Considering these are the ideals of Trump, keep the youth dumb and the women dumber, I hope my message gets reached. ✨

attributes.title: Freezes Up Iphone DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I was so excited to be able to keep up with the President, but the moment I opened the app, my screen FROZE! Ever since downloading, my phone has never been the same since. It has been glitchy and freezing all the time, not a joke, do not download if u don't want ur phone like mines. Worst. App. Ever.

attributes.title: Horrible......disgusting........repulsive
attributes.review: Hi, so I downloaded this app thinking that it was going to be the best thing in the world, like I believed the app would solve world hunger. But unfortunately the only thing it brought to me was failure and sickness. I am currently writing this review sick and dying. So this app is receiving a one star review and if I could I would 100% leave zero stars. 🧚🏻‍♂️🦄🦋✨⚡️🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: NEGATIVE VIBES😡
attributes.review: i mean honestly this app is just horrible and need to be taken down as soon as possible. When i downloaded this app my phone is took nearly 2 hours to download . Then it gave my phone a virus.... a ViRuS 😬🤬🤢.Then it took me to all these appropriate cites. I tried deleting the app and then siri started cursing at me😢 I was in shock... in shock and ladies and gentlemen.

attributes.title: Disgusting App
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so badly and it constantly kept shutting down after i installed. I do NOT recommend this app at all. It makes everything go slow and is constantly spamming with notifications even when I clicked for it to not send me any! I hate it. Delete this app.

attributes.title: bad bad bad
attributes.review: I tried to be a good trump supporter but every-time I tried to get in the app it would crash my entire phone. It was so frustrating and now I can’t get my daily dose of fake news... oh well. But overall, terrible experience I don’t get what those boomers see in this app. 0/10 would NEVER recommend.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. IT BROKE MY NEW PHONE!!!
attributes.review: I decided to get this app to support our president but then I noticed that like the president, the app sucked and could not process any information. This app not only drains your battery EXTREMELY quickly but this app made my battery NO LONGER FUNCTIONAL. This free app just costed me a lot of money in repairs for my phone. This app is DYSFUNCTIONAL AND ATROCIOUS. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO MY WORST ENEMY!!!!! 🧚💕✨xoxo bunker boy✨💕🧚
